about_the_game:
Tired of being a janitor? Now you can become a delivery man! A big heavy bag instead of shovels, an attractive smell from it and the same goal to save up for a ticket to start a new life.

The «Delivery» DLC is a new game mode where you take on the role of a food delivery man!

Features:

  • Look for shops in the city and pick up orders (the main thing is not to eat along the way).
  • Deliver orders to the right addresses (the wind will direct you).
  • Call the intercoms to get customers to let you into the house (and warm up).
  • Earn a ticket to leave the endless city of panel houses (again?)

* All screenshots are taken using the built-in cinematic mode.

name: PANELKI – Delivery DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
